resources.string: Visit Wellingborough
Pubs
Restaurants
Parks
SightSeeing and Attractions
The Hind Hotel, town centre, NN8 1BY
17th Century Grade II listed coaching house now a pub and hotel
The Cannon, town centre, NN8 4DJ
Sells a large range of real ales including Adnams Broadside and Young\'s Special
The Horseshoe, town centre, NN8 1BS
Traditional pub with darts, pool table and beer garden. Live music on a Wednesday
The Red Well, town centre, NN8 1BD
Wetherspoons pub selling meals, popular with the locals, named after one of the five wells of Wellingborough
The Coach & Horses, town centre, NN8 4HY
Serving 12 real ales and 20 craft ciders, Pub of the year 2014, beer garden
The Och and Dough 2 miles from town centre, NN8 4UF
Hungry Horse pub, serves food, soft play, free wifi
The Priory 2.5 miles out of town centre, NN8 2LF
Food, soft play area, free wifi
Beefeater pub serving food, hotel, garden, near fast food outlets, NN8 2DP
The Dog and Duck, 1 mile out of town
The Cutting Room town centre, NN8 4PG
Old cinema, serves food and real ale, sports tv
The Rising Sun, town centre pub, NN8 1PF
Friendly traditional town pub, locally brewed beer sold, pool table
Pizza Hut,1 mile from town centre, NN8 2DP
Serves buffet at lunch times
Yumeijin, town centre, NN8 4JJ
Chinese restaurant and take away, all you can eat on Sunday
McDoanlds, 1 mile from town centre, NN8 2DR
Restaurant and drive through
KFC, 1 mile from town centre, NN8 2ED
Restaurant and drive through
La Roca, town centre, NN8 1AH
Genuine Italian food overlooking 16th century Tithe Barn
Jenny\'s, town centre, NN8 1AY
Restaurant burgers, fish and chips, fry ups, milkshakes and more
Castello Lounge, town centre, NN8 1AN
Caters for meat-eaters, vegans and vegetarians alike, alfresco seating
Voujon, town centre, NN8 1DW
Indian and Bangladeshi food, eat in and takeaway, vegetarian
Ali\'s Indian Restaurant, town centre, NN8 1DW
Indian eat in and takeaway
Jam Rock, town centre, NN8 1DW
Home-made Jamaican classic food, vegetarian options
Irchester Country Park, 2 miles from town centre, NN29 7DL
Big open spaces, woodland walks, visitor centre, cafe
Splash Park, 1 1/2 miles from town centre, NN8 1PA
Free entry and parking, picnic tables, shelter, ice-cream and hot food
Stanwick Lakes, 8 miles from town centre, NN9 6GY
Adventure trail, adventure park, walks, birdwatching, visitor centre - drinks and food
Wicksteed Park, Kettering, 7 miles from town centre,NN15 6NJ
A variety of rides for all ages incl. roller coaster and dodgems
Sywell Country Park, 5 miles from town centre, NN6 0QX
A former drinking water reservoir, fishing, cafe, walks
Museum, town centre, NN8 1XB
On the site of the town\'s victorian baths, shop, film nights, cafe and events
The Castle Theatre, town centre, NN8 1XB
Right next to the museum. Shows, films, bar and food
The Silver Ladies, 1.5 miles from town centre NN8 5FL
Art installation welcoming visitors to the town
Carnival, town centre
Usually held in the middle of July, parade around town with floats, ending in Croyland Park, NN8 2EN, where there isa funfair
Waendal Walk, town centre, NN8 1XB
International friendship walk. Distances from 3 - 24 miles, hosted by the Castle Theatre
Medieval Festival, town centre
Yearly festival, usually held at the beginning of July, jesters, medieval crafts, mock battles and more!
